I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "typical" (this is an adjective modifying the noun "device")
* "nanomorphology" (this is a term that refers to the study of the structure and properties of nanoscale materials, and is not a material name)
* "mixed solvent mixtures" (this is a term that refers to a type of solution, and is not a material name)
